brief: Develop a user management system for an online learning platform.
business_problem: Educational institutions struggle to manage user data efficiently, leading to poor user experiences. A streamlined user management system is crucial for enhancing student engagement and retention.
target_users: Administrators and instructors of online learning platforms
goals: Create user registration and authentication endpoints
Implement role-based access control for users
Develop API documentation for user management features
deliverables: Database schema for user roles and permissions
assessment_criteria: API performance, security measures, and alignment with user experience needs

user_stories.title: User registration
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to register new users so they can access the platform.
acceptance_criteria: Given I have user details, when I submit the registration form, a new user is created.
The system sends a confirmation email to the registered user.
If registration fails, appropriate error messages are returned.

user_stories.title: Role assignment
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to assign roles to users so they have appropriate access.
acceptance_criteria: Given I select a user, when I choose a role and save, the role is updated.
Users with different roles have access to different resources.
Changes in user roles are logged for auditing.

user_stories.title: User authentication
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to log in securely to access my account.
acceptance_criteria: Given I enter valid credentials, when I click 'Login', I am authenticated.
If credentials are invalid, an error message is displayed.
Sessions are managed securely to prevent unauthorized access.
